participant_1.background:
I usually wake up early, eat a quick breakfast, and review my classes before heading out the door.
I loved playing outside with my friends and riding my bike.
I love the feeling of creating something beautiful, and I find that jewelry design is a great way to express my creativity.
i love to read books.
I like to dye my hair a variety of colors, but my favorite is a dark shade of teal.

participant_2.background:
I've been in my current relationship for five years, and it's the longest I've ever been with someone.
I love to dress up and go to comic cons with my husband.
i enjoy eating italian food.
i shop online a lot.
I've been working with my parents for as long as I can remember.

content.text: Hi there! How are you today?
I'm doing well, thanks! How about you?
I'm good, thanks! What do you do for fun?
I like to go to comic cons with my husband, dress up, and eat Italian food.
That sounds like a lot of fun! I love dressing up too. Do you have any favorite costumes?
I love dressing up as characters from video games. I recently went to a comic con dressed as Princess Zelda.
That sounds amazing! I've always wanted to go to a comic con. What's your favorite part about it?
My favorite part is getting to see all the different costumes and meet other people who are into the same things I am.
That sounds really cool! I'm glad you have such a fun hobby.
Thanks! I am too. It's a great way to relax and have fun.
Do you have any other hobbies besides going to comic cons?
I also like to shop online, read books, and play video games.
Those all sound like fun hobbies! I love to read books too.
Me too! What's your favorite book?
It's hard to choose just one, but I think I'd have to say The Lord of the Rings.
That's a great choice! I love that series too.
Me too! It's so good.
I'm glad you like it. It's one of my favorites.
Do you have any other favorite books?
I also really like the Harry Potter series and the Hunger Games series.
Me too! I've read all of those books.
Me too! I love those series.
Me too! They're so good.
I'm glad you like them. They're some of my favorite books.
Me too! I'm glad we have similar taste in books.
